tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE high_risk_patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    risk_factor VARCHAR(50),
    monitoring_required BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE high_risk_patients (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	age INT,
	diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE high_risk_patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    risk_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE health_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES high_risk_patients(patient_id),
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE interventions (
    intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES high_risk_patients(patient_id),
    intervention_date DATE,
    intervention_type TEXT,
    outcome TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE HighRiskPatients
(
patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
patient_name VARCHAR(255),
age INT,
diagnosis VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientVitals
(
patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
heart_rate INT,
blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Medications
(
medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
medication_name VARCHAR(255),
patient_id INT,
dosage VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Interventions
(
intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
intervention_name VARCHAR(255),
patient_id INT,
intervention_date DATE
);
